buffmobs.config.title: BuffMobs Configuration
buffmobs.config.general.enabled.tooltip: Master toggle for the entire mod. When disabled, no mob buffs will be applied.
buffmobs.config.general.visualEffects.to: Show particle effects on buffed mobs. Disable to reduce visual clutter or improve performance.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.enabled.toolt: Scale mob difficulty based on in-game days passed. Mobs become stronger as time progresses.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.interval.tool: How many days between each difficulty increase. Lower values = more frequent scaling. Recommended: 7 days (1 week).
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.multiplier.to: How much stronger mobs get per interval. 0.1 = 10% increase per interval.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.maxMultiplier: Maximum strength multiplier allowed. Prevents infinite scaling to maintain balance.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.showNotificat: Display messages when difficulty scales up. Helps track progression.
buffmobs.config.dayScaling.notificationM: When to show scaling notifications: EVERY_DAY or only on SCALING_INCREASE_ONLY.
buffmobs.config.attributes.healthMultipl: Multiplies mob health by this amount. 2.0 = double health, 1.0 = no change.
buffmobs.config.attributes.damageMultipl: Multiplies mob damage by this amount. 1.5 = 50% more damage, 1.0 = no change.
buffmobs.config.attributes.speedMultipli: Multiplies mob movement speed. Higher values make mobs faster.
buffmobs.config.attributes.attackSpeedMu: Multiplies mob attack speed. Higher values = more frequent attacks.
buffmobs.config.attributes.armorAddition: Flat armor points added to mobs. Each point reduces damage by ~4%.
buffmobs.config.attributes.armorToughnes: Flat armor toughness added to mobs. Reduces effectiveness of high-damage attacks.
buffmobs.config.effects.duration.tooltip: Duration of status effects in seconds. -1 for infinite duration (permanent effects). Infinite effects are refreshed periodically.
buffmobs.config.effects.strengthAmplifie: Strength potion effect level for mobs. 0 = disabled, higher = more damage.
buffmobs.config.effects.speedAmplifier.t: Speed potion effect level for mobs. 0 = disabled, higher = faster movement.
buffmobs.config.effects.resistanceAmplif: Resistance potion effect level for mobs. 0 = disabled, higher = less damage taken.
buffmobs.config.effects.regenerationAmpl: Regeneration effect level for mobs. 0 = disabled. Not applied to undead mobs.
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.enabled.t: Mobs can inflict random debuffs on players. Adds extra challenge and variety to combat.
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.chance.to: Chance per attack to apply harmful effect. 0.15 = 15% chance per hit.
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.poisonDur: Duration of poison effect in seconds. Applied when harmful effects trigger.
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.slownessD: Duration of slowness effect in seconds. Reduces player movement speed temporarily.
buffmobs.config.harmfulEffects.witherDur: Duration of wither effect in seconds. Damaging effect similar to poison but stronger.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.dimensi: Full dimension ID (e.g., minecraft:the_nether). Leave empty to disable this slot. Use F3 to find dimension ID in-game.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.healthM: Health multiplier percentage for this dimension. 100 = normal, 200 = double health.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.damageM: Damage multiplier percentage for this dimension. 150 = 50% more damage than normal.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.speedMu: Speed multiplier percentage for this dimension. 120 = 20% faster movement speed.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.attackS: Attack speed multiplier percentage. Higher values = more frequent attacks.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.armorAd: Flat armor points added in this dimension. Stacks with other armor bonuses.
buffmobs.config.dimensionScaling.armorTo: Flat armor toughness added in this dimension. Reduces high damage more effectively.
buffmobs.config.mobFilter.useWhitelist.t: Only buff mobs in the whitelist. If disabled, uses blacklist mode instead.
buffmobs.config.mobFilter.whitelist.tool: List of mob IDs to buff (whitelist mode only). Format: minecraft:zombie, minecraft:skeleton. Use F3 to find mob IDs in-game.
buffmobs.config.mobFilter.blacklist.tool: List of mob IDs to never buff. Works in both whitelist and blacklist modes. Default: minecraft:warden (too overpowered).
buffmobs.config.modidFilter.useWhitelist: Only buff mobs from whitelisted mods. Useful for mod compatibility control.
buffmobs.config.modidFilter.whitelist.to: List of mod IDs whose mobs can be buffed. Format: minecraft, twilightforest, etc. Default: minecraft (vanilla mobs only).
buffmobs.config.modidFilter.blacklist.to: List of mod IDs whose mobs should never be buffed. Prevents specific mods from being affected. Useful for avoiding overpowered mod mobs.
buffmobs.config.dimensionFilter.useWhite: Only apply buffs in whitelisted dimensions. Useful for limiting mod effects to specific worlds.
buffmobs.config.dimensionFilter.whitelis: List of dimensions where buffs are applied. Format: minecraft:overworld, minecraft:the_nether. Use F3 to find dimension IDs in-game. Default includes all three vanilla dimensions.
buffmobs.config.dimensionFilter.blacklis: List of dimensions where buffs should never be applied. Prevents mod effects in specific dimensions. Useful for peaceful or creative dimensions.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.ena: Ranged mobs switch behavior when close to players. Affects skeletons, piglins, pillagers, etc. Makes ranged mobs more dangerous and unpredictable.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.beh: How ranged mobs behave when players get close: 'melee' = switch to melee weapon, 'retreat' = back away tactically, 'random' = 50/50 chance per mob.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.swi: Distance at which mobs change behavior. Lower values = closer before switching.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.mel: Movement speed multiplier when in melee mode.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.ret: Movement speed when retreating from players. Higher = faster retreat.
How long mobs retreat before stopping. 20 ticks = 1 second. Default: 60 (3 seconds).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.cus: List of custom mob IDs to apply ranged/melee switching. Format: modid:mob_name (e.g., iceandfire:ice_dragon). Use this for mobs that don't auto-detect as ranged.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.sto: Day when stone swords become available. 0 = available from start (Overworld/End).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.iro: Day when iron swords become available. Default: Day 7 (Overworld/End).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.dia: Day when diamond swords become available. Default: Day 21 (Overworld/End).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.net: Day when netherite swords become available. Default: Day 60 (End only).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.gol: Day when golden axes become available. 0 = available from start (Nether only).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.dia: Day when diamond axes become available. Default: Day 14 (Nether only).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.net: Day when netherite axes become available. Default: Day 45 (Nether only).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.enc: Add enchantments to melee weapons. Makes melee mode more dangerous.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.max: Maximum number of enchantments per weapon. Actual number scales with progression.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.day: Days needed to increase enchantment level. Lower = faster enchantment progression.
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.sha: Day when Sharpness enchantment unlocks. 0 = available from start.
Maximum level for Sharpness enchantment. Default: 5 (vanilla maximum).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.fir: Day when Fire Aspect enchantment unlocks. Default: Day 14.
Maximum level for Fire Aspect enchantment. Default: 2 (vanilla maximum).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.kno: Day when Knockback enchantment unlocks. Default: Day 7.
Maximum level for Knockback enchantment. Default: 2 (vanilla maximum).
buffmobs.config.rangedMeleeSwitching.swe: Day when Sweeping Edge enchantment unlocks. Default: Day 21.
Maximum level for Sweeping Edge enchantment. Default: 3 (vanilla maximum).
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.enabled.toolt: Use custom presets for specific mobs. Overrides dimension and default scaling for mapped mobs.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.presetName.to: Unique name for this preset. Used in mobMapping to assign mobs to this preset.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.healthMultipl: Health multiplier for mobs using this preset. 2.0 = double health, 0.5 = half health.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.damageMultipl: Damage multiplier for mobs using this preset. 1.5 = 50% more damage, 0.8 = 20% less damage.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.speedMultipli: Movement speed multiplier for this preset. 1.2 = 20% faster, 0.9 = 10% slower.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.attackSpeedMu: Attack speed multiplier for this preset. Higher values = more frequent attacks.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.armorAddition: Flat armor points added for this preset. Each point reduces damage by ~4%.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.armorToughnes: Flat armor toughness added for this preset. Reduces effectiveness of high-damage attacks.
buffmobs.config.mobPresets.mobMapping.to: Map specific mobs to presets. Format: 'minecraft:zombie:default' (mobid:presetname). Unmapped mobs use dimension/default scaling.
